home.subtitle: A safe place for your notes

secureSection.title: Secure storage
secureSection.text: All your notes are encrypted and stored in a secure environment.

devicesSection.title: Access from everywhere
devicesSection.text: You can open and edit your notes from your desktop, notebook, tablet or phone.

markdownSection.title: Style your notes
markdownSection.text: You can use Markdown to make all your notes beautiful.

downloadSection.title: Create your first note for free

emailInputHelp: You must have access to this e-mail to confirm your account.
passwordInputHelp: Your password will be encrypted and stored safely.
